awd_titl_txt: West Coast Regional Workshop on Architectural Research Needsin Earthquake Hazard Mitigation
awd_abstract_narration: This project will organize, convene                                             and report on an NSF regionally-                                                based workshop on architectural                                                 research needs in earthquake hazard                                             mitigation.  The workshop will                                                  review the current state-of-the-art                                             in relation to earthquake hazard                                                mitigation in architectural and                                                 nonstructural systems, and relation                                             to broader land-use planning issues                                             and physical urban design issues.                                               Future research needs will be                                                   identified and prioritized for                                                  these same systems under the goals                                              of the Architectural and Mechanical                                             Systems Program (AMS) program                                                   element.  The workshop will focus                                               on West-Coast issues.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
